text: Goh Gun (; hanja 高建; born January 2, 1938 ) is a Korean politicians and civil servants. ==Career== Goh is best known as Interior Minister, Agriculture Minister, and Prime Minister of South Korea. He was also mayor of Seoul. He served as Acting President of Korea in 2004. == Related pages == * Rhee Syng- man * Kim Kyu-Sik * Yun Poson * Chang Myon Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea Category:Presidents of South Korea Goh Kun Category:Mayors of Seoul
title: Goh Kun
